title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Friday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       dropped 0.95% to $610.31 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.16% to 38,109.43 and the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.07% to 4,890.97. The stock's fall snapped a six-day winning streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed $18.18 below its 52-week high ($628.49), which the company reached on January 24th. Trading volume (38.5 M) remained 4.2 million below its 50-day average volume of 42.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The stock looks like a bet on Trump himself more than a company with significant revenue and profits.
